results.deck: Sonic Advance features a new character called Cream the Rabbit along with her Chao "Cheese". Sonic Advance 2 has catchier and faster paced music and an overall better sense of speed than the original. Dr. Eggman is at it again and its up to Sonic and friends to stop him.
results.description: Sonic Advance 2 was published by THQ rather than Sega, and developed once again by Dimps. The game features new mechanics such as the air moves performed using the R shoulder button and D-pad. It also includes many improvements and changes to make the game feel much faster; the characters start off running on each level, they can reach a much higher top speed and also have much faster acceleration. This was the last game to ever use Yuji Naka's Sonic 3 engine.
results.name: Sonic Advance 2

game.name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose!
